Title: Time for After
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Matthew Negrete, Corey Reed
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Chandler Riggs
Plot: Negan has to enlist the help of his lieutenants in solving a huge issue facing The Sanctuary; Rick and the group continue to enact the plan.
